Title: Requires parole violators in the counties of Jefferson, Oswego, and Saint Lawrence to be transferred to state correctional facilities after 10 days in a local correctional facility
Summary: Requires parole violators in the counties of Jefferson, Oswego, and Saint Lawrence to be transferred to state correctional facilities after 10 days in a local correctional facility.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to parole violators in Jefferson, Oswego, and Saint Lawrence counties; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
